lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Name it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you agree to these terms, or does our hunt continue?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They sound really powerful, these pixies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you are not powerful enough to conquer them, how would we have a chance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you do not think you have a chance, perhaps you're best suited as our meal for the night."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we have a very good chance of defeating them. We are quite powerful. Just wondering why you haven't done it before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have fallen to their magic. We are not tested and tempered against such trickster cunning "creatures. But if you speak like you've passed the campsite unscathed, perhaps you have skills we lack."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is true. We probably do. We made quick work of the camp. It was a proud moment for us, one that will be storied for generations.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This mystic-- Iotha, you said-- she has the power to subjugate your kind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does she have the power to create more lycans?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She sees our kind to be exterminated."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where can we find this site?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Follow the lights."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The lights?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The small, glittering fey lights that you've seen throughout many of the darker forested areas of the Feywild since you arrived, now taking a look, they all slowly, gently drift in a singular direction before touching the ground and dissipating. Even though the wind that blew through with their arrival has faded, they all still drift in a direction as if they're being called a specific way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. Hey, question. Should we help you with this terrible problem you've been facing, do you think there's any way you would want to help us when we try to take out this cancerous tree? It needs to be taken care of. Teamwork?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cancerous tree?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really bad. Whole other area for you to dominate. It's quite wonderful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Shademirk bog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goddamn it! Wait, it's my favored terrain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The forest isn't going to help you with your persuasion check, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wolf leans forward, and the mouth comes right up to you for a second. The nose almost nudges you, and you instinctually stand back as it (snorts). "This is not part of our parley. We "grant you passage and to take what you wish off their pixie corpses. That is the deal. Take it, or "we hunt."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we'll take the deal. Happy to enter into this contract with you. No problem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're just stacking contracts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a timetable to this? Do we have to do this now? Can we do this on the way out of the Feywild?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is no

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have your word that we have completely safe passage? We don't have to worry about any other sort of monsters getting us in our sleep on the way there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They and us rule this brush. Against each other, nothing will take your path away. We can "guide you if need be."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we take out the pixies, what is the future of your tribe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The brush will be ours. We will no longer be taken, our people left there to wither and "waste away to the elements."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a question. Do you guys hunt the pixies? Because I'm getting the sense that this is a weird turf war, and I just want to know the full story before we enter into this contract.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bear, who's closer to you, takes a step forward, and you feel the ground shake behind you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I match his step.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other of the wolves nearby see you, and they all (snarl) crouch down, snarling in your direction. Lord Ukurat puts his hands out. "Calm, "my brethren. We wish to live in peace amongst the woods, away from those who would hunt us, outside "and in."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't you guys just agree? You guys take this half of the forest, and they'll take the other? I can even help you guys build a big wall, if you want, not to get oddly political. Maybe death is not the answer here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the wolves nearby speaks up, "She speaks like she knows this place." And you hear some laughter. The wolf's head, which is turned to you, Lord Ukurat turns to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They think I'm funny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many total are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were seven, including the 12-foot-tall one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can probably take them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not trying to take sides here. Just from a third party looking in. Trying to understand both perspectives, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have only heard one perspective."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Learn what we have learned. Perhaps that will help "guide your choice."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a bad idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I find that very reasonable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is very agreeable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We will be watching." At this point, Lord Ukurat crouches down, leaps up into the canopy of the forest, and you hear (impacts) as he leaps off in the distance. The other wolves (howl) follow suit and dart off in separate directions, and you hear as the bear backs away, Trinket growls back at him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be nice to him, Trinket!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear growl) The bear goes, (grunt). Trinket goes (grunt). Broseph bear snarls. You guys are left to the quiet of the forest now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could probably kill them all. I'm just throwing that out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm super restless.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am charmed at the drop of a hat!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you fought a werewolf before? Have you fought a lycan? Is it just brute strength?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, they are cursed. They seem very unhappy. They have to sit in rolling chairs at all times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We literally have no idea what we're up against in any direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are scary fairy stories, though, growing up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've heard about people that transform, but any specifics about their capabilities--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a few spells that are good against people who can transform, but we're also in the Feywild, so I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cute and dainty also means scary and dangerous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We really bollocksed up the musical instruments scenario, and I don't feel like the pixies are going to be much better than that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like that went rather well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All things considered.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Took less than three tries to figure that out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we ran in for 30 seconds, shit the bed, and then got the hell out. We didn't try to end them. We didn't finish anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It also bears remarking that Garmelie said we're not supposed to side with either, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, Garmelie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's really up to you guys. I don't know if you have much of a choice right now."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't we just thread the needle and play them both?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Until we get out of here. We're talking about exterminating the group of fairies--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're destroying one of their relics.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just have to desecrate a relic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't think they're going to put up a massive fight if we go in and start kicking their relics?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we've desecrated relics before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan is really charming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could probably convince them to destroy it themselves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How's that book going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You genuinely think we can destroy the relics without harming anyone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I'd like to try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I also will admit, I kind of want to see the pixies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to see the pixies, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You also wanted to hear the music. That didn't go well. We've got a bow to get you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's just go over there, do a little recon, and then we'll make up our minds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are idiots.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm more inclined to turn around and fight these lions and tigers and bears, oh my! Because pixies, who knows?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Honestly, they didn't seem that bad. I feel terrible killing them for no reason.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can talk to the pixies about--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you would look fetching in a new lined winter jacket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe they can work with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm okay with at least going to do some recon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go see the pixies. We send in Garmelie. If he dies, then we make a choice. Do you have a revision to that plan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would think that would be the last portion of the plan. Everything else goes forward, "and then, all else fails, perhaps Garmelie would have a hard time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Garmelie. Go, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're our guide. Guide us. We're supposed to go where we're going, so you're supposed to get us there. How do we get there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Follow the lights.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know exactly how to go there. Follow the lights."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, you're so brave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We brought you here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Garmelie, I'm so curious as to what happens if you're going to renege on our contract.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you want to draw some of the pixies if we see them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If they let me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can hide behind Grog, and you draw the pixies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can maybe do that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're going to be pixies with giant dickbutts everywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Garmelie, is there anything in particular about pixies we desperately need to be aware of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're tiny. They're frail, mostly mischievous."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How tiny?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He makes a motion with his hands about like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're really that small? Are they super strong?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, they're quite the opposite, actually."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But there are lots of them, and they're fast and invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's hard to say."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also say, if we are going to attack the were-creatures, it would be nice to have a little help, maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Help? From whom?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From the pixies. If we explain our situation, we can make a decision and either help the were-creatures or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the pixies can help us take out the cancerous tree and all the things around it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's go get eyes on them, shall we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a survival check. With advantage because you're in a forest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm in a forest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, just her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just her, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's better. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. As we come into the event, Vox Machina is slowly crawling through the Moonbrush towards wherever these gentle fey lights drift, leading them, hopefully, to some sort of home space or residence of the local Wishers pixie population. You guys, pushing on for about another two and half, three hours, following the lights.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Reading.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many hours do you have left of reading?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After two and half more, I have about four and a half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Garmelie immediately goes, "I'm going to hide now," and he goes invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Garmelie, won't they see you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's possible. Should I just stay back?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should probably just hold onto Grog. If he runs in, just trail behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys now see what appears to be a thicket in the center of this portion of the forest. Maybe 20 or so natural-looking homes forming a small glowing community, almost like they were grown out of the ground of the local trees. The bark itself protrudes from the side of a tree and creates a dome-like abode that has carved little windows in it and a glowing interior. It's a very pretty fairy community out there, right in there in the center. All of the fey lights in the forest are slowly drifting in towards the center of this community. At a hundred-foot distance, you can just make out the faintest details.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're teeny, though? It's teeny little houses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like doghouse size?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each home or abode is about the size of a basketball.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they made out of toadstools?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to see from this distance. You can just see the general size of the homes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is so cute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Vex is the only one that can see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's the furthest ahead, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like "cute" is the last word we should use for this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will be the last word you ever say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely pixie city is up ahead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we look for perimeter alarms or traps?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I look for that. Good idea, Grog! Good thinking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go stealth, just because.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make a stealth check, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not still active anymore?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was awful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're doing stealth checks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of those who wish to move forward towards the village.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, all of us? Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we adding plus ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all locked in a stone position and currently now have draped over them small vines and flowers, and they now rest amongst the community as some sort of a landmark.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, that is kind of fucked up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see at this distance now a few moving, slightly brighter points of glowing light fluttering by and going from one little home to another. One over and into the circle flutters back. You guys are still at a good 40, 50 feet from the outside of this clearing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we can't spot any pixies near us at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not directly near you, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hate spiders.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to go near this place. We should either talk to them, or run away right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like the latter of those two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was the goal here? To grab part of the circle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To break a piece of the circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To kick over their rocks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did they say to bring one back? Or to break it? The relic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They said desecrate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They said it was the source of their power, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Desecrate it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You ever stepped on an anthill, right? It gets real nasty, real fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it an open area over the village?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a clearing of trees about 25, 30 feet across, and along the interior of the trees are where a lot of the homes are grown out of, or out of the ground almost like strange tree trunk roots up into a dome-like natural home, and even they're arranged in a smaller circle around the central stone circle that is the middle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like forest wasps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It all depends on the definition of desecrate. I could fly you 500 feet in the air, and you could shit upon that circle. It just depends if that is desecration in the eyes of the fey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will say that from what I gather of this realm, it probably isn't enough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we asteroid-dropped Keyleth from 500 feet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was very fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would take out the lot of them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it would take out the lot of them, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It seems so drastic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The fairies or the fairy circle? Wouldn't it just destroy the circle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How wide is the entire--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 25, 30 feet for the entirety of the community. The circle itself is five to ten feet wide. It's not a very large circle at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'd be in your stone elemental form, it'd be no problem for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'd be no problem for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They have some sort of shield up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'd be kicking the hornet's nest, certainly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell me this, Vex, Vax. People with high perception.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's Vex, I'm Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are the animal men? Are they watching us right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that, 20? No, 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33. Doing a pretty intense scan of the vicinity of the forest around you, you see no sign of any of the previous pack that you encountered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think they're out there somewhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they're probably hanging back a bit. I don't know if they'd want to get this close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure they have other means of spying on us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Never thought I'd say that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's what I have at my disposal. A, I can shapeshift into a little tiny spider and go in there--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you shapeshift into a pixie?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, unfortunately. Beasts. Particular.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't you go underground and pop up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Once again, probably destroying their entire village, but yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The two of us could snipe something out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I could go in like a spider and be a spider. I also happened to bring Hallucinatory Terrain today, so depending on how smart we think the lycans are, maybe I can make it look like we destroyed it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long does that last?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 24 hours. Let me double check before I make promises.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just to give us a day's head start.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What we could do, Grog and I could run back, I could cut him over the eye, and say: It was horrible. It was quite a fight, but we won.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to let the pixies know that we're going to do this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe Scanlan, do you have something that could-- I don't want to waste a spell and then find out that they have some sort of magical barrier enchantment that it can't stay up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, you'd waste Hallucinatory Terrain?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When else are you going to use that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm burning a spell slot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If they block it with their magical little crystals all over the place, then they'll also know we're here and they will attack us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, 24 hours for a 150-foot cube, I make a terrain look, sound, and smell like some sort of other terrain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just worried that if you do it then the lycans are going to bust it, and then they just go to battle amongst themselves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Isn't that brilliant?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is actually really smart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, can you still tree-bamf us out of harm's way if we needed to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got the mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have the mansion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's already burned the mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't slept in days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The only thing I have that can get us out fast is Plane Shift, which will get us out of the Feywild, but I brought that just in case.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Third option, we say fuck the lycans, fuck the pixies, and we just keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you do the Hallucinatory Terrain, and we just leave?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we could do the Hallucinatory Terrain, and if it fails, then I guess we won't be in any worse situation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a big fan of Hallucinatory Terrain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we do Hallucinatory Terrain and it fails, the pixies will straight-up attack us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it won't hurt them. It just makes it look different.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything here has attacked us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All in favor of Hallucinatory Terrain, raise your hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to get the animal men here to see it, or else it isn't worth it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We cast it and we create a ruckus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will buy into this idea if we have a plan for when the pixies are about to literally attack us five minutes from now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we can do Hallucinatory Terrain, and if we run into the lycans, all we have to do is say we did it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do Hallucinatory Terrain. Garmelie, which direction should we run if we're running towards where we're supposed to be going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Garmelie has watched this thing with eyes wide, and he's like, "That way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Weren't you dropping little green rocks?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was dropping little green rocks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we can find our way back to the lycans, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's of course assuming that the little green rocks work here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were red. They were red rocks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's an awful lot of reasons why the little red rocks wouldn't work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We take off running--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, where are we running?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Towards the bog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Towards the what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We think towards the bog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're leaving Kiki and just running?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I can do this at a range of 300 feet, so let's back up 300 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do it, we act like we did something, we start running.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hallucinatory Terrain, are we doing this? Are we ready? Are we doing this? I did it, bamf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What kind of hallucinatory terrain are you creating?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want it to look like the fairy terrain, but their little huts are on fire like they've been raided, and I want the circle of rocks to be obliterated, and all their statues to be knocked over and it smells like fire and shit and pixie blood. Like Grog said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grasping at what you imagine pixie blood would smell like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Herbal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as Keyleth, you finish concentrating, you guys watch as there's a shimmer of magical energy, and now you see where once the beautiful glowing fairy light of the pixie abodes now look burnt to a cinder. You can see embers slowly rising off of them as the stone structures are now broken across the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The horror, the horror.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The pixies see it too, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They can see it, but they can also be like: oh, this isn't real.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab Keyleth by the wrist and start running away from the village.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we running back to the lycans or to the Shademirk?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Towards the Shademirk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got Garmelie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go, run faun, run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But keep on the lookout for mandrakes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And werewolves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so I want everyone to make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Strong eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you looking out for? Which direction are you looking?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking towards where we're going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going with Garmelie, heading in the direction duskward. Where are you looking, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm looking out for werewolves, for lycans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Where are you looking?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm looking for lycans, too. I'm just being honest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys continue pushing forward--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm shouting: The way is clear!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys run, and run, and run, and you're pushing through brush and pushing over elements and heavy hard portions of the floor. I need everyone to roll-- this is going to be an athletics check for the keeping up the endurance and the speed. This is not easy terrain you continue to push through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Athletics?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got land stride, so I don't get slowed by any hard terrain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine. You don't need to roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled twice, because of disadvantage. Both were ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've hit the spectrum today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I rolled a one, but then I used Luck and I rolled a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, calm down on the extremes! There are other numbers between those two, you realize, on the dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm tired from reading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution of 20; he's good to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's basically good against anything except one of the ancient dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiny brain with arms and legs, not so good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck that little bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was fun. Eventually, you begin to see a thinning of the trees, like the forest is coming to an end. You're beginning to hit the edge of the duskward side of the Moonbrush.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going the right direction, Garmelie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know! Yes, we're going the right way!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're taking us through the bog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Through the Moonbrush. That's what we're going through."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still to the bog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course! Where else would I want to go?!" He's holding his hat and rushing along.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to go to the theater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No theater!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your problem with the arts, man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, at this point in time, come to the final tree line, Vex and Vax and Garmelie helming at the front of the pace before all three of you slam into something extremely hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did it feel like a theater?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it felt like a wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The wall of a theater?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously. A wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stand back up and you guys catch up, and same thing: you come up to the edge between where the trees that hit the perimeter of the forest are, and there's a barrier, an invisible barrier right there that's preventing you from crossing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is this thing, Garmelie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know! I haven't encountered this."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never ever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't walk into the middle of dangerous forests for fun!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think we can leave until we take care of this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait. You can go invisible. Is it magic? Can you tell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can have a look at it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, have a look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes up and looks over it for a bit. "To be honest, this is a large-scale enchantment. This "is some sort of-- this is very powerful, very old magic."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking old magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns around, looking at you guys. "Hi."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking past you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Behind them, landing and standing up to his full height, his snout having to dip beneath the brush under the nearest trees.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See what we did to those pixies? Wrecked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking destroyed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cut me real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you now see as Lord Ukurat steps from them, and they all begin to form a semicircle around you. He goes, "Were you trying to flee?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were running from the pixies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We destroyed their home, and then we took off running. That's what you wanted, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're so scary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you had done what we asked, you would have been able to leave this forest."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we have to try harder. It didn't work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We will go back and we will do it better this next time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, I don't remember entering a formal contract.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You took off before we shook hands or anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You told us to go take a look at the pixies first. And to get a second opinion. And we have made it to the edge of the bog safely, without your need of safe passage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He says, "Do what you will. I have no interest in "you. Liars, deceivers! You talk too much. Your meat would taste like ash in my mouth. Well, good "luck. Enjoy your time locked in this prison like the rest of us!" The wolves turn around and walk away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, you're locked in here because of the pixies?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like they're terrible communicators.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they should've told us that. I don't think they wanted to tell us that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would've been a good incentive for us to destroy the pixies. We can't proceed without destroying the pixies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A little communication is all we need!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take out my bloodaxe and go up to the magic barrier and hit it as hard as I can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be appalling. Don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do I do that? I forget. I'm kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been a few episodes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I need you to also make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sweet. Natural one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to love it when the crew laughs at your final death crack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull back with the bloodaxe, you slam with all your might into the barrier. As it hits, there's a streak, a flash of vibrant, bluish-white light and what sounds like the highest shriek you've ever heard in the entirety of your time on Exandria, at which point you watch Grog get flung backwards at incredible speed through the air, the actual blast sending you almost into your allies and party, slamming into one of the nearby tree trunks. The bloodaxe goes plopping to the ground as you feel a number of bones in your back crack from the impact. You suffer 28 points of psychic damage and 14 points of bludgeoning damage from hitting the tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we all learned a very valuable lesson right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's a good burrowing creature? A badger?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we need to rest, you guys. We really need to rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's sit down and camp, and in the morning, we'll go and kill some pixies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Are we trapped in here because we were deceitful to these wolf-men, or because the pixies are trapping everybody?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The pixies are bitter little assholes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People enter and exit the forest without an issue."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We entered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we entered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So why are we trapped here? Because we lied?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (belches)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to attempt to cast Minor Illusion on the other side of the wall. Just an image of myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you attempt to cast the spell, the arcane energy dissipates upon impact with the barrier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Garmelie, who do you know that's left these woods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be my uncle Jameson, who's the person I learned most of this information about "the Moonbrush from."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your uncle Jameson, and he was definitely telling the truth that he went in the woods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He was probably a little intoxicated when he was spinning these tales, but--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is Jameson his real name or a nickname?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know, it's his real name."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he knew about the happy camp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These were the things I was warned of, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want to waste any time trying to take your broom up and see how high this barrier goes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can dig and see if we can go under, just in case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't jive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's true. It didn't hurt us when we just ran into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, when we ran into it, it felt like a brick wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I fly up. Can I fly up and see how high up it goes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You get on the broom, you go past the canopy and eventually, the front of the broom clips and scrapes against, and you can see a little bit of a shimmer of the barrier that domes up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a bubble. We're in a bubble. I go back down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a proposal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't we make our way back to the pixie dome and say: oh, we were chased by these horrible lycans! We wanted to kill them, but we got stuck when we hit this invisible wall. Could you do anything to help us get rid of the lycans? And then we play both sides of the coin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is way better than our first idea, and yet still terrible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we have to pick a terrible idea and stick with it until it becomes far too much for us to deal with.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take a look around and do a perception check to see if anyone else might be watching us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not bad. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. You take a moment and glance about the tree line, the floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there rustles in the bushes from someone who might be invisible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No movement any further. Once the rest of Lord Ukurat and his crew had vanished into the nightward direction, you've seen no movement since.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They could've attacked us, and they didn't. They just want out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're just scarier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I propose we take a nap. Go back and deal with the pixies one way or another.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I agree with Percival. I think all our options are shit. We pick the least shitty and see what happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, can you sleep?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I read for a few more hours first, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll take first watch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long have we been up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time, I'd say close to eight, nine hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it hasn't been a full day. Let's call it an early night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Read your book. We'll sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. You take first watch. We're going to zonk out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll stay up, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're taking a short rest or a long rest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he can finish reading and then we can sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, sure. So you're taking first watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm up with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you...?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to go Minxie and do a little perimeter walk in the forest a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the rest of you are resting, you're finishing up your reading. You go Minxie form, and you go wandering the perimeter. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Looks like a seven. Nope, that's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're stalking through, looking about, you catch a scent, a new scent. One you're unfamiliar with. It smells sweet, like a freshly fallen and opened fruit. You immediately instinctively look down and sniff across the ground. Out of the corner of your eye, you see a glow as you see two small, humanoid entities with pairs of wings flutter in in front of you and stop. What languages do you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Elven, Sylvan, Primordial.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One says, "I'm not familiar with this one! I don't think I've seen this creature in here before." The other one glances over and goes, "You don't think she could've done it?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that last bit? Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't think that she could've done it? It's just a cat." "Is it, though?" They both get closer and inspect you. They're both rotating around your face and fluttering. One starts pulling on your ear a little bit, tugging on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start purring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one backs up and goes, "We have to keep looking. Something did this."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wait for a second, and then start stalking them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You follow them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The rest of you guys are taking a rest. You continue reading.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm awake. I'm keeping guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They meet up with a third one, and they have a quick little discussion and then branch off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I hear the little discussion, anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to get closer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have stealth as Minxie. I get benefits, right, as a tiger? Oh, yeah, I do. Oh, not good. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you creep forward in the middle of their discussion, the three of them all whip around at you. One of them pulls a wand out and puts it out in front, and the other two back up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just start eating grass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's totally tiger-like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two that saw you before are like, "She's been following us." "Why?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I roll over and show my belly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that has the wand out goes, "I don't want to take chances." Puts the wand out. How many hit points do you have? In Minxie form?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shuffle shuffle, flip page, flip page, flip page.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. 52. They're going to Finger of Death me, aren't they? They're going to do something bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Raises the wand. There's a slight tingling sensation, and then nothing happens, and looks at the wand. "Strange." They all convene and start whispering to each other very close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look distracted with other stuff. I sniff and wander off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They separate a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just doing cat-like things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just start pissing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mark my territory. I spray a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross. That's foul, Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear one of them say, "We can always correct it later, but best to be safe than sorry." As you're peeing, I need you to make a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If she gets petrified while she's pissing, it's going to be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's either a one or a 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll just start a new one. Don't worry about it. Fuck, why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this shit on camera? We're recording, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That one's a 19, can I go with the 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't take it off the table before it's real.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Twice in a fucking row? What are the chances? Do it again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's a 16, that's good. Saving throw, so 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw is 21 total?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got my ring of protection, which gives me a plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three pixies go, "We have to tell her. I don't trust it." And they all flutter off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I head back to camp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still reading.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth? Keyleth, dear? Shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whenever I'm back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. I go and I kick Vax awake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ow. Why did you do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oi. Your girlfriend's not back yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She went off prowling as Minxie and she's not home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take off flying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking A.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh jesus. Oh man. I'm a big girl, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is not what I meant for you to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is your first time really trying out your wings. You're also in a very dense forest, so there's no space. As you heroically take off, you impact. Your wing hits a branch, and you go spinning out of the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I Spider-Man from tree to tree like the werewolves did using the wings a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're trying to. Make an acrobatics check with disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a Plinko machine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make it, but a wingspan of that size, amongst tree-tops, is going to do very little other than what your general leaping would do. You get a little bit of gliding space from point to point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm still fucking asleep is the problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But you don't fall. All right, so we'll say for the next couple hours you guys do-si-do in the forest until eventually you do convene. Your wings wear off, and you find yourself back at the camp, Minxie safely arriving just as you finish your final page of your book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who knew? It was terribly hacky and derivative, and it read like Fifty Shades of Grey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Something different about me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Did you do your hair differently today?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you shorter?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel so interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's impossible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Scanlan goes right into the deepest slumber he's ever experienced.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good. You guys are back, everybody's safe, everything's good?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I stalked a couple of fairies for several hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know all this. She told me two hours ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I caught him up a little bit as we were walking back. Pretty sure it is the fairies who are creating the magical barrier, and I'm pretty sure it's because we might've scared the living shit out of them, so it might've all been still our fault all along, like most things are, so we'll talk to the fairies tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If they don't find us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They are actively looking for us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They saw you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They saw me as a cat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did they do to you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think they tried to cast several spells on me, and by some luck of the draw, I managed to feline my way out of them. I think they are looking for me and us, and I won't be a tiger anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my ranger abilities and try to disguise where we're camping?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I help hide? I'll help her a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys find a little alcove by one of the bigger trees nearby that has some of the roots recess inward, and you build a small camp there that's covered with thatch and branches.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have any concept of what time it is in this perpetual night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You really have none.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to get a little sleep, though, so I can get my spells back. Anybody else taking watch?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, stay up with me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She needs to rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's already been up for four hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stay up with me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can cuddle with me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't offer that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I will sleep, then, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and nap. You guys are staying up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pick a space near Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make perception checks, both of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Partway into your watch, you do see, whereas there was the very faint, ever-present falling of the fey lights, you do see what looks to be two brighter lights that are traveling together, shifting about a little ways past your sight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you see that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fireflies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Well, sort of. Let's watch them. I don't think we should go out. I think we should let the group rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, the little lights?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, your friends. We'll let them sleep unless those things come closer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they coming closer, or are they keeping their distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're keeping a distance. They don't seem to notice you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They might've heard you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They start heading in your direction. Do you guys do anything? Are you going to stay quiet? What do you do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't move. I go stealth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I freeze in an exotic pose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check with advantage because of the camouflage that she put.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have that camouflage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already have your crazy bonuses, but yeah, take advantage on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of eight? With advantage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A six and a two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Grog! Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the pause after, and Grog uncontrollably laughing at it, partially because the intent of Keyleth staying close to Vax while you guys were resting, and it went in her direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I shuffle uncomfortably in my sleep. I don't know why I just had a nightmare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as two of these fluttering points of light about ten feet out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm staying still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stay there for a second, and then go darting off into the distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One look and they ran.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to talk about your diet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your diet! Do you eat any greens at all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, pickled herring, and I've been grabbing stuff as we walk through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That just happened. He wants to talk about your IBS, and there are lycans.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I crawl over to my sister and shake her and say: wake up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't fly away like I did. Oh, wait, your broom's over there, all right. They are watching us. They came in close, and then they left, so I don't think we're safe anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we fucking should get out of here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wake everybody up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, look. We've got to talk to them anyway, right? We're not going to run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least we can prepare ourselves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sleeping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just keep sleeping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wake Percival up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi, grumpy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've been discovered by fairies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get ready to use your charming wiles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to let Scanlan sleep a little bit more, because he looks fucking exhausted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it, you put him back to sleep? You go back to bed, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, fine. Can we make things look fancy around here so when they all come back, we look like we're ready to talk to them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I slowly crawl out. I pull out a piece of parchment, and I write: Hello, fairies. We're napping. And I put it on the tree above us and go back to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're letting Whitey go back to sleep, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whitey? Are you calling him Whitey as a nickname?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I think it's apt. Fuck it. I go back to bed. I spoon Keyleth and fall asleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I actually go back to sleep, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What in the fuck is going on here? How is this happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're the only one awake.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, fine, my watch. I'll get up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sit up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I sit up and take the watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you know what, I'm going to put out the little gold tea set, and I'm going to act like we're welcoming them to tea whenever they show up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will take the watch, and I will make some tea with the tea set.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The cups are bigger than they are. Oh, you made drowning pots for us all. How lovely. It's going to be a threat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I never did actually find out what this tea set does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're about to find out, then, aren't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you know what, and I take out my old wooden music box that I discovered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, pull out all of your cursed items.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I wind it up and make some pretty music.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a crazy grandma in the woods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am joining you for this ridiculous tea party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it, thank you. Don't drink out of the teacups, because I really think they might be cursed. Seriously, Percy, I know it's appealing to you, but don't get cursed again, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You set up your music box. A couple more hours pass, the rest of you coming to a semblance of a restful sleep. The only ones who didn't get a restful sleep on this would be Vex and... Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I specifically did not join those conversations.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You barely got in there. You do not get your spells back, unfortunately. Scanlan, you reduce your exhaustion by one point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I got sleep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, yes, so you're down to only one point, which means your speed is no longer halved.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I had two points of exhaustion? I thought it was just one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wanted to keep reading.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hair is shiny, eyes are bright.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your charisma's up by two, which means--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I already did it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, towards the end of this watch here, you see as a cluster of seven lights now start swarming in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're starting to come to as Vex begins to nudge you guys to consciousness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get spells back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oi, Scanlan. Sing a happy tune about how much we love fairies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sure. I love singing happy tunes. About fairies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like how pretty they are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about I just sing a happy tune?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sounds good, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll sing a song about myself. The best kind of songs. (singing) Cube, glorious cube! You really should try it. If you're in the mood, I won't even hide it. I'll pull down my trousers for any gal or dude, O cube, glorious cube, wonderful cube, magical cube!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sounds of your voice, accompanied by the music box playing through the air as the Wisher pixies arrive, at least this troupe of them come rushing up. You see they are all behind one that appears to have-- while all of them have a slight white with a hint of pinkish glow, there is one that has a deeper purple halo around it. As they all approach, they stop, and the purple one goes up to the paper that was left on the tree. "So! Enjoy your nap?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wasn't quite rested, but it was lovely here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is tea. Would you like some tea?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We might have straws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am tempted to fashion the thing that I use to pour my molds into little sippy cups that can be shared.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've been trying to prepare for your coming. Unfortunately, we don't have very much to make it appropriate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are aware we need to have a conversation. Good morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, we do." And the other pixies flutter down to the ground. She flutters down, as well, and they approach the tea set.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say good morning to them in Sylvan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that has the purplish halo is an older one with whiter hair that's a little wild around the face. You can see the wings themselves look a little more tattered and worn. She's probably the respected elder of the troupe that's there. As they all step forward, she inspects the tea set and looks up. "So."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You see, we were trying to pass through these woods, and we ran into a band of very big, very mean-looking wolves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the pixies at once go (gasps) and they pull back. The purple one says, "You ran into them?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not only did we run into them, but they forced us against our will to attempt to do you harm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which, of course, we didn't want to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we thought we would just trick them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pixies at this point are darting around to each of you. You each have a pixie hovering right in front of you, quickly inspecting your bodies. You can see now the central one, the glowing purple, is in the air, backing up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They didn't bite any of us or get any of us. We're not infected.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look around. You see the pixies all turn back, looking, okay. One of them by Grog turns and goes, "He's been wounded!" Pointing at his head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His cut?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that was him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cut his eyebrow, and then he fucked himself by trying to smash through the barrier that I assume you created.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, don't go through that wall. But bidet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're on a mission, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A great mission.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we are to continue this conversation, we need comfort. He is disquieting. Allow us."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's cool. Please, do as you will.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we talking about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let them feel at ease. Go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The older one glances over at you. Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural one. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you grin, you watch as his flesh goes an even duller gray color as his entire body turns to solid stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that temporary? Is that going to last?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now. Let us have a conversation."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. You've encountered these beasts."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they instructed us to kill you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, not to kill.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They wanted us to hurt you. To destroy your circle of stones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They sent you to come and kill us and destroy our home?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We misspoke. To destroy this circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You speak in many words that do not meet as one thought or theory."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you're a bit intimidating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the very tiny pixies all look at each other and look at you large folk, there's a little chuckle under their breath.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are wise enough to not judge a man or woman by their size, good sir.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't want to harm you, so we thought if we just made it look to those silly, dumb lycans like we hurt you. By throwing paper balls, if you will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop antagonizing the Grog statue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did just a simple visual spell, and we tried to move on, as to not get involved.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did everything in our power to protect you, and to not harm you. If our druid's spellcasting frightened you, we apologize, but we didn't know what else to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we have a bog to destroy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we're on a very important mission, and we thought it might be the quickest way to complete.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a cancerous tree that we have been sent to destroy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just want to walk on out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is not our fight, you see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The older one is glancing about, and a couple of the pixies drop next to her and whisper into her ear, and her eyes are still darting amongst you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I understand what they're saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're very small, and they're very distant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really, really off-putting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The elder one crosses her fingers. "Few are those "who would deal with such miscreants and foul entities as those wolf kin, so much as to give our "little hearts a possible scare of death to our homes in an attempt to escape without but a "conversation. This puts us at unease. We do not like being at unease."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Understandable. But we weren't trying to deal with them. In fact, we made no deal with them. We told them we wouldn't make a deal until we spoke with you. But we were scared. We were too scared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were trying to exploit our abilities. We were being held against our will. We were threatened with life or death. There was nothing personal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one wet his leg, and he's gigantic. We just didn't know what to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She puts her hands up. "Very well. Mistakes are made, and punishments are doled out. So. We "shall return to our village. We shall lower the barrier to you, and all shall be fine."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And our gray stone friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But we've learned our lessons, and you may go "about your way."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How can we buy his freedom?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got a tea set.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How can we buy his freedom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Wishers set you free."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Wisher.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. I can fix it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? What do you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have Greater Restoration. She left, right? That wasn't in front of her. I didn't say that to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She says, "Very well. Good luck on your endeavor." The rest of the pixies gather up around Grog's body, and you watch as they all glow and his stone form, as heavy as it should be, suddenly becomes weightless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, no, we need that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, they're taking him. Oh! I cast Earthbind on Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Earthbind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It should ground him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does. He slams into the ground with all the weight of a falling stone goliath into the dirt. At which point the pixies immediately go off and turn around. "You would cast incantations "towards us?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I cast it to my friend, who is about 12 foot tall and a giant target. Come on, don't make stories up where there aren't any.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stories, nothing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? You fairies are manifesting these ideas, okay? You are creating a dichotomy that does not exist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all gather and begin to whisper to each other, their heads darting around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, see, look. They're doing it right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point: "This display is enough. Your words and your actions speak in difference, in "entirely opposing directions. If you are to continue to throw these words, these deceptions, "these lies in our direction, then perhaps we'll take you all for our garden."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't advise that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then let us take him, and you move on with your lesson." And they go and pick him up once more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wouldn't you rather have a song? Wouldn't you rather have-- how often do you get a performance?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cast Hex on the main pixie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it, it's on. I call out to the main pixie: Wait. What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you guys watch as a shadow all of a sudden darts up from the ground and clings around the pixie. She whips around, at which point you now hear another (impact) as the stone Grog slams into the ground, all the pixies scattering around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See,

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not very nice, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now watch as all of the various very gently falling fairy lights begin to (flitting) and be absorbed by the pixies of the forest. As their glows intensify, the purple halo growing, you see the central elder figure of the Wisher pixies say, "At least our allegiances now lie bare." I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you quickly--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just looked it up for that reason. That's not good. That's not a good initiative at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20 on an initiative. I don't know what I can do to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I notoriously roll terrible on my initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many are there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot, but they die quick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they going to form a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A Voltron?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's exactly what I was thinking, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like it would be easier to hit if it was a giant Voltron.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that angle is not going to be kind to those trees.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the best check to give him? I can give him disadvantage on an ability check. So wisdom or intelligence?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The werewolves were honorable. These guys are assholes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel better about killing them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me, too. They're dicks. They were going to take Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were trying to take Grog. Fucking assholes. I feel like we were very reasonable, considering how unreasonable we normally are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were put between a rock and hard place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And a hard Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we had no choice. Really. It was a bad situation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog is on the ground? Oh, he is on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, he is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm stoned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beautiful. That was too good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just couldn't let it go. I'm so sorry. I just couldn't let it go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was that my fault this time? it was a mild combination. I might have contributed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should've fought the fucking werewolves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we should've, but we didn't, because we're idiots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, initiative order. We have 25 to 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 27, as well, with a natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 21 for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are some fast motherfuckers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 20 to 15?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those fairies are so spread out. I thought they would all be together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as they dropped, they fanned out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were trying really hard not to shoot first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five? And Grog is stone. Sorry, buddy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You first, bud. Coming for you first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Top of the round, Percy and Vex, you're up first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's the one that I hexed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that you hexed, which I will mark here, looking overhead you can see is the one with the brighter, vibrant glow right there. That is currently the one, so I'm marking that as the Hex right there. There you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you think they're really hard to hit because they're small?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably. I'm going to move over to my left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. A little bit more. I want to line them up in a cone, so if I can get as many in a cone as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do we have the cone templates? Because they're not by me right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a 60-foot cone there that I have. It's a big cone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a very big cone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about just a comb?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to cast Hunter's Mark on the shiny one that he hexed, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hunter's Mark on that one as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Double. They're weak, you guys! Milk jug rings, take them out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Zack. I appreciate that. So 60-foot cone. You can get four of them into it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What we don't want to do is spread out too much and get fucked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Conjure Barrage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Conjure Barrage. All right. Dexterity saving throw. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a 15 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success. Success. Success. 18, 19, 19. And 16. All succeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they take half. 3d8, halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll damage, halved. Grog's stone form takes full damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Sorry. 15, halved. Plus Hunter's Mark damage on the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the one, so roll for that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got three on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't forget to Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's one action, isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action to cast, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I can't use Trinket yet, because I already did something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end your turn, unless you want to move some more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to duck behind that tree, like it's going to do anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many points of damage was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To you? To your stone form? That was 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the blast of the impact you can see parts of the stone get rough a little bit at certain points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can break.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Statues can break, and that's bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's super bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody lost an arm that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want Trinket to move at all?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket runs and stands next to Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Got it. That brings us to Percy, same turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Taking a shot with Retort, with the little pistol at the fucker I've marked. Dear god almighty. 16 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does not hit. As you try to shoot, this tiny little glowing thing darts out of the way and the bullet goes wide.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shoot again. That's better. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's with three points of necro in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time you do see as it moves out of the way you compensate for it and fire, this time you see the purple glow flicker as it takes an impact and recaptures itself into its original position.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to take one more shot at it with-- remind me if I can do this-- deadeye with sharpshooter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deadeye sharpshooter? You can do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, deadeye sharpshooter. Thank god. This is just sucking. Oh my fucking god. I miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You don't misfire. All right, so after the second shot hits, you fire, trying to compensate a third time, but the pixie actually stays in position and your fire goes wide once more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Now I'm diving behind that tree. Bottom right. Heading that way, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, that ends your turn. The purple pixie leader, the mystic you mentioned before, now angrily comes fluttering forward, as you both have vanished. Seeing this little circumstance, is going to, from this position, look towards you at the very front, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It begins reciting under its breath.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do Counterspell at level six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh snapricot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you just say "snapricot?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a fucking hipster.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going so poorly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Gollum voice) Nasty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you cast your Counterspell, mark off your 6th-level spell. It finishes the incantation, as it does, a bit of arcane energy sprays forth from its fingertips and dissipates around it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aw, that's sad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Darts backwards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Out of camera view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Scanlan you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're so far, and I don't know what they can do. Probably a lot. I'll step towards that tree in front of me, in front of the bear and the girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's far as you can get.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That cluster of the pixies over there? I'll see if I can get three of them in a Fireball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
