lines.text: If I can, the leader and the ones closest to the leader. But I don't know if I'm within range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you just using a single charge for it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, I have lots of charges, don't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many came back? You have to roll for the last couple of times you've gotten a full rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't used them in a long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah that's true, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use two. A 4th-level spell, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4th-level Fireball.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's 9d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Range is 150 feet. Radius is 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you pull out the wand and release it, one of the nearby pixies-- It has no effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Assholes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, they can do that, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god, other people can counter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Passive-aggressive dungeon master! Oh, that's so sad. Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the wand once again sputters out, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's dead? Or it still might work after that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it might still work after that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That one use, okay. Can I move any more, or am I all moved out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll inspire Keyleth. I'll turn to her and say: (singing) It's been a hard fey's night, and you've got to unfreeze Grog. It's been a hard fey's night, because we've been fighting like a dog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now the pixies' turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn it, Bobby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're all super magic, super-duper magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it's going to stay here, and before it moves... that will be in range. If I could have Keyleth make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is my bailiwick, yo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You also have an inspiration die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have an inspiration die. Ooh, I don't think I'll need it, though. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28, yeah. No effect on you whatsoever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You even lift, bro? Come at me, bro. Got the John Cena going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one over here, as it flutters by after seeing you attempt to cast the spell, Scanlan, I need you to go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy. Advantage against magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's magic in general?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I'm looking at it. Yeah, advantage versus magic on his saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, bard shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it because War Caster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, War Caster is advantage on concentration checks to maintain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No it's not War Caster. It's something else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's on his sheet, which means he found it somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it's typed. It's typed up; it's not written in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Both rolls were shitty, and I only rolled a total of five on the better one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as the pixie darts to the side, it mutters something underneath it and raises its hands up. Scanlan, all of a sudden your body shimmers for a second, and you guys watch as the already small gnome becomes even smaller.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is now a badger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a what? I'm a badger?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It then continues its movement over here by the side of the tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gnome Cunning, Matt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I tried to be diplomatic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot of good it did you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why'd you do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's Scanlan's bag, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I thought we were all-- never mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would be getting our asses kicked by a group of werewolves right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: People were preparing tea, you were being cordial. I was trying to be disarming. Next time, everything dies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is our punishment for--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to settle this amicably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For intelligence, wisdom or charisma--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that was a wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you're fine. Universal, so strength saves, it doesn't help for any of those.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just saves against magic for those three things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This other one here, glancing over and seeing you there, is going to look towards you. I need you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got advantage. Good, I got a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You have advantage from?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Being a half-elf. Oh, it's not charm, is it? Then the first one was shitty. Ten or 11, somewhere around there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are a kitty cat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I use luck to take my second roll? I have luck left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have one luck left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have two luck left, after sleeping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, technically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so the second was a 17. Plus two, would've been a 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you're not a kitty cat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I really would like to be a kitty cat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I asked if I could use one of my lucks instead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So wait, he's not a kitty cat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In my heart, I am a kitty cat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog is stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's worse things than being a kitten, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one over here leans towards you, Keyleth. I need you to make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Already? Come on. Come at me, bro.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should have all been pixies from the beginning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27. You never roll low on those wisdom saving throws. It's really frustrating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wise as fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, now comes to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Click go the boots. I'm going to run 12 squares and squat down just north of Grog. I'm not going to shit on you. I think I can make it all the way around to the other side of Grog, and I'm going to dagger, dagger, dagger at queen of the pixies there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there? Okay, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Third is an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, second two hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Yeah, but it's not anything fancy. That's the weakness of the rogue. Where's my pyramid? There it is. So the first one which was the critical is big 11 for the first one on a critical. And the second one, I'll put poison on it, as well. Seven for the damage, and it's a DC of 15, for poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For poison, it does not succeed. It is poisoned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 2d10. 14 with poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. All right, so now the mystic, the central pixie is fluttering, but it's not looking amazing. All right, so that ends your turn? All righty. That brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shouldn't have gone in that cave, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I dash and go a little bit further and still do an action and lose a bonus action? No, it's either like run or nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A dash is an action, meaning you move and then your dash, to move more, is your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Here's what I'm going to do, I'm going to try and start making my way towards Grog, I'm going to do the 30 feet towards him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see the fairy leader?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her with a little bit of cover.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to blow my 6th-level spell. I'm going to cast Sunbeam, and Sunbeam her in the face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that go through her? There's one on the other side of her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Does it go through to the one on the other side behind her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it would go in this direction. She's right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was looking at the red one, closer to me. I don't have the fucking pointer!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's Grog, the red thing near you is Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, not that fucking red-- this one. Yes, that one. Jesus. And the one behind it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. As you muster your Sunbeam, the leader, who has not used her reaction yet, is going to attempt to counter that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 6th-level, though, so it isn't an auto-counter. She has to roll for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a contested thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking bitch. I said

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Counterspell, so that DC is 16. That is a 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is 19, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it, that was a 6th-level spell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The grace and poise of the Ashari.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you muster your Sunbeam, the currently wounded, poisoned-- let me check one thing real fast. On attack rolls and ability checks, because she's poisoned, she has disadvantage and has to roll again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, she does!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So it still counters it. So you go to put your Sunbeam, the light begins to build up into the middle of your grasp, as you're about to unleash it and she darts up from behind the side of the tree and unleashes a torrent of arcane energy that feels like a gust of warm wind hits and scatters the Sunbeam from your grasp, the spell lost.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Umbrasyl, in the can. Fairies, dead as shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys are supposed to have good parades.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's the end of your turn Keyleth? All right. Garmelie turns invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course he does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't they want to Counterspell that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, and he took out a tree while he was at it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got to find a way to fix the glare on the mat without the angle falling forward. All right, top of the round, Percy and Vex, you guys are up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. From my vantage point I'm going to sit down, take out Bad News, take another deadeye sharpshooter with Bad News at the big fat fucker by the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As of right now, technically, you have no sight on her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are way back there, and she is completely behind the tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I take a step out to the left? As long as she has less than three-quarters cover, I'm okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you would have to move-- she's very tiny, and the tree that's probably five foot or more thick. So based on her size, as part of her advantage in using these trees is you'd have to get over here before you can see her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so I'll move to my right a little bit, then, and I will shoot that fucker that's right in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. This one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. Sharpshooter and with deadeye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a natural 20. That makes the grit go away, anyway, so nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking golden snitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so this is double the dice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you roll the dice and then double that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll the dice, double it, and then I add everything. Lordy, this is going to be disintegration. Six, 12, 22, 28 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 points of piercing damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To that one, all righty. That's adding the sharpshooter?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I rolled really low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gotcha. Okay, so you take the shot, the blast echoing throughout the trees and the treeline. You watch as the pixie takes the slug and actually gets thrown to the ground and then flutters back up, barely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Flutters back up, barely?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It was undamaged before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing fancy, just hitting it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's better. 24 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of damage. You hear this horrible, high pitched (yelps) as the light is scattered by a burst of what looks like a tiny blood spray, and dust and smoke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I call out: One! And back up behind the tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Out of how many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. If I step out from behind the tree, do I have a sight on the big one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll get cover bonuses. You'd have to get over here to see it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I walk over there, then? Okay. I walk to there. I want to use my Longbow of the Sky Sentinel and attack it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You initiate the bow, pull back the arrow, and release as it splits into three different arrows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm looking at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jesus Christ. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Defying statistics, one roll at a time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 24. Wait, 12 plus 12, 24? All right, so the second one hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then 22 on the third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three hit. Even with three-quarters cover, the last one just barely hits. Roll damage on all three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kill them all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 on the first hit, no-- oh shit. You double the dice? Six, that's 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So add six to what you were saying, originally. You said 20, so it'd be 26 if you're doubling that die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 26 plus another five, so 31 on the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 on the first hit, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 plus five is 22 on the third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the purple light gets stapled to a tree in the back. You watch as the arrow hits her and carries her and she tries to pull herself off of the arrow as it's holding her against the distant tree and then it goes limp against it and the light slowly fades.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. So I shout out: Two! Your leader's dead! You want to still fight us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got two more squares of movement if you want to use them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I move towards the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way or this way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be her turn, but she just got stapled to a tree. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Build a dam. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she didn't turn you into that. One of the other ones did, I believe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, the one I killed turned him--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right. Thank you. Scanlan has dropped beaver form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, I was not expecting that, and therefore have no idea what I'll do. So there's pixies everywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only really see one of them right now. Yeah, this one's supposed to be there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see that one over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there one behind me? You can't see one that I can see, actually. There's one around the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sorry, two. You can see that one, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll help him first, but yeah. I can do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They could possibly turn on us, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What're you doing, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wasn't expecting to move! I can't see the leader, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's pixie dust.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit! Not ready for this!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Y'all ready for this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit! Okay, I'll turn around, and let's just hope that it works this time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, this is the longest--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know! I wasn't expecting to move! How close am I to that one near the tree? Can I move to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here? This one or this one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The closest one to me, and how close am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one's closest to you, and it's 20 feet from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to run to it, her, it, whatever, because I don't think they can-- well, maybe they can Counterspell this, but I'll do a Thunderwave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do a Thunderwave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. At level two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one is going to attempt to Counterspell. Each one of them gets a Counterspell; that one's not done it yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do have a sword, shit, I'm the worst at this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you rush up and begin casting it sees you rushing up and its eyes go wide for a second as it instinctually puts its hands out and the Thunderwave falls flat before you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, I'm the worst at this!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to be a beaver again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all I can do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought he was a honey badger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little angry badger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's alive still? I'll inspire... shit, I'm failing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never seen this before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's broken. It's stealing all of his energy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Inspire Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll inspire Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The girl!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The guy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to inspire him. I want to inspire her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex, the girl. I'll say: (singing) Vex is natural, Vex is fun! Vex is good when she's one-on-one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was next to go, but that's still good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I was a badger! I don't know what's been going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Why that one? I do still have my inspiration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This ain't going to be no thing. It's going to be great. It's going to be beautiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20! My voice just cracked, but it's a natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Isn't it hilarious that we all have work tomorrow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is. No, I have a recording and an audition tomorrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It actually rolled when you moved the paper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When you moved the paper, you rolled it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I did, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll it again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When I revealed it, it was a 20. That's okay. I'm going to do inspiration though, just for safe measure. That's good, so 20 total now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 total, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's still exciting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it reaches out towards you, you feel your physical body all of a sudden begins to tighten, and you flex, and it regains its composure. No effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I just give her a-- (grunts) from the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here is going to dart past, and as it does, from tree to tree, I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Straight up 15. Fuck it, I'll use luck. I've got one more. Another 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 total? All right, you are currently restrained as your body tightens up and you are unable to move, shift, take any actions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you go, too?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was about to, but not anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you petrified, too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's restrained.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he get turned to stone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His body is beginning to turn to stone right now. His muscles are beginning to tense up. As this one darts past, it is going to attempt to-- I need you to make another constitution saving throw, Keyleth, as it watched it fade from the last one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20! This is a real one, this time! A real one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is the deal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're gone for one week. You guys can save these for throughout the campaign. This is a pixie fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a really powerful pixie fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are nasty in their strengths. They're not very strong in a lot of things, but the few things they have are pretty good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know. We're still terrified.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. Well, you resist your second attempt at being petrified.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I restrained, or am I slowed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're restrained, which means you can't move. The actual definition: attacks against you have advantage. Your attacks have disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I can still do stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do freezing up and haste do mixed together? Anything? Cancel out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't cancel out, it just means that you have disadvantage on all of your attacks. Your speed is zero; you can't move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have a third attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have a third attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very confusing. Feywild, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're fast and slow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hot and cold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy here-- I need you to make a constitution saving throw as it peeks around the tree from its current position.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get one, and

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got some inspiration, lady.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got inspiration! 21!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You resist the effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone's got to live!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To tell the tale of the death and end of Vox Machina to little people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many more pixies are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to dagger, dagger, dagger the pixie in front of Scanlan, so I should get sneak attack? I don't have advantage, so I don't get sneak attack. That's three attacks. First one is shit. 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage? Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Second one is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The last one is a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses. So two hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, whatever. 11. And eight. 19 total.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you poison damage it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one's looking pretty rough right now, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I say: (strained).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn, I need you to make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on! Do you have any more luck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax now turns to a solid stone statue, frozen in place. Two members of your party are now turned to stone. All right, that brings us to Keyleth's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to continue my two steps towards Grog, since he was my first destination, and do Greater Restoration and unpetrify him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what level is that spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking 5th.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 5th-level? Only one of them has Counterspell left, and it's going to attempt it, but since it is at 5th-level, mark that off. It does still have to roll against it. DC is ten plus five, so DC 15.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If they make this, it's bad news.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They made it, didn't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's a 15 plus three, sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They had to make 15? Not my spell save DC or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The good news is they're out of Counterspells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fantastic now that I've burnt through two of my top-level ones!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Back to the top. Percy and Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go. Do you want to go first? I'll go first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! I wanted to do a bonus action! I did want to do something on a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I Alter Self my throat and (howls) give a wolf howl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make a performance check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you calling for the fucking werewolves?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I'm calling for the lycans. Ooh, that's good. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ends your turn. Percy, Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to flip around and take a shot at that jerk right there with the Retort pistol, not the Bad News. Standard shot. That's a 31 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one is spattered by the impact. You see the chunks of it hit the tree behind, and you see a wing right in front of you, Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I reload. I flip around the other side of the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over to this side here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Over to this side so I can get a good vantage point on that one that thinks it's hiding right over there. I use my bonus action to cast Hex on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To carry it over?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, to carry it over. And I take a shot at him. That's 22 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten points of damage. Three necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets shot. The impact hits the tree next to it, but it splinters and hits it, takes some damage but not a whole lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn an action surge and take three more shots at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that. You're ignoring the cover because of your sharpshooter feat, so go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten, 20, 30, 36 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many fairies are left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have currently two fairies left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't see them on the board from where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you don't see them. They're hidden.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking two more steps, and I'm getting that next fairy that thinks he can fucking hide from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two behind this tree and one behind this tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking one more step out so I can see him. Actually, I have pretty good sight, don't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From there, you can still see him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's right. I can't get Hex until next round, though. 27 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Damage on that one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 16 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pixie gets hit and holds itself against the tree. Its wings stop fluttering. It looks over at where the impact came from and stares down at you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another shot at him. Same deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can spot him now because I can see where Percy's shooting at, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets another hit. This one impacts just near it and clips one of its wings. It's still holding in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I dive back around the tree, and that's the end of my turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where was it that he was shooting at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over this way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can Trinket reach it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket can try. Trinket's not going to be able to get there, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to attack it. Can I attack it from where I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to get into sight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get. I would say it has three-quarters cover, so you can attack it, but it gets plus five to its AC.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to attack it. 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to attack it again with my blazing bowstring. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I move my Hunter's Mark over?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eye squint says no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Because it's a bonus action, you would've done it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, man! Okay, seven plus seven. 22 on the first hit. 24 on the second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (arrows loosed) Off to the side. One arrow actually grabs it by the shoulder and hits it against the tree there, and as it tries to pull the arrow out, which is this giant shaft that's shattered its shoulder entirely, it looks back at you as you take its head off its shoulders.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Teeny tiny little piece of shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The cutest swear ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't move anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's as far as you can move. Does that end your turn? Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I see any of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. I'm going to run as far as I can into the open and see if I can see any of them, while I'm yelling: Where are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just barely see two of them behind that tree right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Behind that tree? You mean behind Grog and stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Behind Grog, Vax, Keyleth, and that cluster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have a clear shot? Without killing my friends?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Depends what you're doing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With a Lightning Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably going to hit Vax, but who knows the effect lightning would have on stone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then I won't do that. I'll cast Bigby's Hand at level seven and punch into that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big swollen hand, fucking fat veins on the back of the hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you been lifting, Bigby?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're looking good, Bigby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know those Hulk gloves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At 7th-level. So it does an additional 4d-whatever it does. So which ability are you using Bigby's Hand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Punching hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The clenched fist. Roll a melee spell attack against its armor class. So roll a d20 and add your spell attack bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll 8d8 force damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 8d8? I don't even have any.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's two more d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 4d8, but because you did it two levels higher, it's 8d8.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll them twice. Whoa!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit. You're a force to be reckoned with. They were all above seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to leave an impression in the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where once there was a pixie, there is a brief spatter of reddish-pink mist, and nothing thereafter. Bigby's Hand has sent it so hard to its afterlife that there is a small black mark on the tree nearby where it once was, just an echo of its existence at one point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's actually literally the opposite.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: High five! Aw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that all the pixies?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's one left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We shouldn't kill it! See if it can unfreeze our friends!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got nothing left. That was my action and bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It stops for a second, and two giant claws reach down and grasp it in its hand, pick it up, and you can see before you, Lord Ukurat is now clutching this one pixie that was trying to escape. Looks inside for a second. (chuckles) "Vengeance is tasty." (chomps) "Not very filling." Stomps forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be confident!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. You called."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We called because our plan worked perfectly, and we were able to fulfill your deal to the letter, as we had always intended.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'm still at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On ability checks, you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With disadvantage, it's a 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can also add your own bardic inspiration to your ability checks now because you're level 14. But if you feel pretty confident with it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm okay with 30.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Should you add it? Add it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too late.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll never know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to know pretty quick. As you say this, he comes forward and gets really low to the ground with his arms out at the sides, face right up to you. He could snatch you up in one bite. He goes, "Clever gnome." Stands back up. "So. One pixie, two pixie, three, four. Where is their leader?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I walk over and scrape the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the rest of your deal to attend to." Turns around and begins walking back toward the city of the pixies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have some friends that are stone right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then bring them along!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, do you need help?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take my last 5th-level spell to dump a Greater Restoration into Grog to bring him back from petrification.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't do it to two people at the same time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can burn my 7th-level spell to bring back Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you should do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will burn my 7th-level spell to Greater Restoration Vax and bring him back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come to consciousness, Grog, suddenly, in a different space than you recall, a little stiff in the joints, like you just had a really bad night's sleep across a whole pallet of broken rock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Diplomacy really isn't that bad!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not so bad. Good job, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to throw my weapons in the river. Hold on, I'll be right back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You make a great parade balloon, by the way. You look great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, as you come to, the heat of the moment, you catch your breath again, and feel that achiness in your joints.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do, I literally do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't feel so good, does it? Hey, remember when I was made into stone? We're twinkies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Twinkies? I don't think that's the term you're reaching for.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the wolves are back. What happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are going to finish off the fairies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, so something happened, didn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was all your fault, really. You were very helpful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, I tried. Those fairies are shifty little shits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? They fought hard? We're going to kill more now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any tips? Advice?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hit hard, repeatedly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't use any of your lower-level spells.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't think that's a problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you burned your lower-level spells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am burnt out on all my higher-level spells.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we cool with the wolves now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're starting to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to go finish what we started, though. They want us to still desecrate the stones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm ready. I've eaten a lot of things today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is everything cool? Everything good?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, you're still here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. No, I was-- got you guys' back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you draw a lot of the fight? I hope you did, because we kicked some ass there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He opens his sketch pad, and you can see there's a bunch of hastily drawn sketches of Vax turned to stone with his finger up his nose, Grog in the ground with his stone thumb up his butt, smiling with his other thumb up in the air like he was. And the rest of you fumbling your attacks as the pixies are laughing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet. Nice. Very good. That tree just moved.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They do that here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to the Feywild. So you guys make your way nightward? Following the Fendirs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I guess it's the only way out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You journey with them. They make a pretty quick pace. Even at your fastest, you resort to tracking them. They're moving with quite alacrity and they know this forest really well. As you guys begin to approach the outskirts of the little grove where the Wishers existed, you see a heavy battle has just begun to calm down. You see two additional wolf statues now stand amongst the area, but the abodes have been destroyed. You see that the tiger has grabbed a pixie and tears it in half. A couple others that have been darting off in the distance, trying to escape, three more of the wolves jump up into the trees, and you see them jumping from branch to branch before their lights--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We tried. I didn't want this to happen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a violent world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, they all begin to slowly gather again towards the center of the town, or what used to be the pixie town. From the treetop, (boom) Lord Ukurat lands next to the stone circle, looks out towards you guys, even beyond the tree line.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, care to do the honors?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Absolutely. I walk up to Lord Pup.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to follow close behind Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you feel the impact. The stone circle, the glowing quartz now dims and goes cold. The center where it used to be vibrant grass slowly turns to a dull gray and withers between the stones. Throws them to the ground. "Now, we are all free. You say you travel duskward to the corrupted tree, yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will follow as my people find a new home for tonight. Should you need my help, just call, "and I will be at your back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are a powerful ally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As are you. Brethren, go. Spread. Find a home again. I will return to you once this debt is "paid. Now, I'll be watching." He leaps into the treetops as the rest of the wolves begin to back away from you and vanish into the shadows of the forest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything around that looks good to take?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we loot the mini city?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am abso-fucking-lutely looting this city. Are you mad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're tiny thimbles full of nothing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a dollhouse at home! There are things that are necessary! Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are welcome to make some investigation checks to scour through the remains of this pixie village.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. What was it again, sorry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you guys keeping back on this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking the crystals, too. The dead crystals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also find what looks to be a really intricately carved onyx statue of a dog, about that big. It's really well-carved. Other than that, most everything else is just inconsequential decorations that wouldn't be much help to you, as they were smaller people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we get to the edge, out of this forest, and then maybe call it a night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a bit tapped on my higher-level energy, but can I maybe take a minute to ritual cast Greater Restoration on the two new statues of the lycanthropes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that a ritual? I don't believe it can be cast as a ritual, can it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Greater Restoration? I can't take my time with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have to stay here the night and do it again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They'll figure it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The gray ground that's been burned, is it just...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just where the circle was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not everything else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Just the circle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like we just killed FernGully.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know. We did kill FernGully.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but if they had any good in their heart, why would they be trapping travelers of any kind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They weren't trapping travelers of any kind, they were trapping the lycans.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then they trapped us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but then they let us out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They didn't really let us out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin trekking duskward again, finally getting to the outskirts of the city. As you reach the outer perimeter of the forest, you reach up and you find no barrier there. It has been dispelled, and you guys step forth into the field, hearing now as you travel further northward, duskward, the gentle sounds of rushing water begin to approach. Garmelie glances past you and goes, "Well, good news. We've reached the Gilded Run."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we're here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bad news, we've reached the Gilded Run."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's sleep in the mansion tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty tapped out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would love to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can't?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I used my 7th-level spell to kill a pixie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why is reaching the Gilded Run a bad thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a difficult thing to pass. Those rivers are quite expedient."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like rapids?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we sleep, I can come prepared with lots of Control Water spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we can sleep in the treetops, where Lord Ukurat sleeps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's sleep up in the trees tonight, before we make our way into this area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys head back into the Moonbrush. You ascend up into the canopy and prepare yourselves, finding an area of branches that can be cleared to give yourself a comfortable space to stay for the evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You realize it's only been an hour since we slept last, but it's all nighty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, travel to and from the center of the forest has taken a few hours, so it's been a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're tapped. We had a long day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It wouldn't be that bad if I didn't get Counterspelled twice. Fucking fairies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, man. It's what they do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Must've been a cool fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys make yourselves restful and set, you all begin to fall asleep to the distant sound of howling as it gets more and more faint. The sleep takes you to prepare for the next run of your journey, next week in Indianapolis! We'll see you guys at GenCon for the next episode as you guys approach the Gilded Run and the Shademirk itself, seemingly getting closer to the end of your journey in the Feywild. We'll see how this plays out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With werewolves in tow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A werewolf in tow, that you know of.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not the rest of them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but Lord Big Badass is going to help us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's going to steal our shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He might try to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll give him Garmelie if we have to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, at the break you were talking about how badly you wanted to kill things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you didn't get to do

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was trying to be diplomatic, all right? I checked off the box!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did, you tried.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Next time, napalm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was an unfortunate circumstance. The wound above the eye, the lack of decent diplomacy, their fear of the spread of lycanthropy--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I even gave willingly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did. You've grown.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a good moment for Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, we're going to have werewolves everywhere now, guys. We just let it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we let the disease spread?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not yet we haven't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to be a werewolf so bad. You're just saying that because you want to be one so bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much! We'll see you guys at GenCon next Saturday at 8pm Eastern, that would be 5pm Pacific time, streaming next Saturday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Backblaze!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No show Thursday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the Saturday show.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Saturday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So guys, have a good night, rest well, and we'll see you next week.
